availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William David Boswell (Lexington attorney and Fayette County Commissioner)

body.p: Residence: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky. Attorney and Fayette County Commissioner.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for William David Boswell (1829-1888), Find A Grave Memorial # 100461377, Lexington Cemetery, Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=BOS&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=1241&GRid=100461377& (accessed 18 May 2017).
